column2:
-You have just woken up-
How did I sleep so long? What time is it? Screw sitting around this place, im gettin outta here Grab what you need and get on the road, keep in mind, you can only take what you can carry!
Aint shit there bro...       keep moving
You got a bunch of junk in here....    Nothing useful except maybe this lighter
Theres nothing in the bed...     Get movin ya weirdo
we should put in if you check the bed 15 times in a row you find something

You seriously need to clean this bathroom!

medicine cabinet
under the sink

night stand things
window pic... Everything looks fine out there
You are in the living room   There is a tv with on a tv stand, a couch, and a mantle over the fireplace with a candle on it

Just last nights dinner sitting on the dining room table and a can of dog food on the floor
There's a few things in here that might help
column6: go out back to the shed
column7: go back to the dining room

column2: Theres a lot of things in here.. choose wisely, you cant carry too much!!! There's also a small box with a lock on it... I wonder where the key is?
Time to make a choice... if you think you've equipped yourself well enough to go out into the world its time to go.... if not lets fix this inventory
